magmaCluster.name: Magma Cluster
magmaCluster.pickup: Increases damage with quick successive hits.
magmaCluster.description: Increases damage by <y>1%</c> per hit <c_stack>(+0.5% per stack)</c> up to <y>10% <c_stack>(+5% per stack)</c>. Resets if player does not deal damage for one second.
magmaCluster.story:
hey oli!

i found this cool ass rock at the asteroid belt!!!
i'll probably be on my flight back home as you receive this, but i wanted you to have it. if for whatever reason, we have to part ways, you can remember me by this.
please don't lose it! i love yoooooouuuuu!
shane

gildedRibbon.name: Gilded Ribbon
gildedRibbon.pickup: Increases movement speed after using your mobility skill.
gildedRibbon.description: Increases movement speed by <b>25% <c_stack>(+7% per stack)</c> for <b>1 second <c_stack>(+0.25 second per stack)</c>.
gildedRibbon.destination:
42 Concord Ln.
Crown Republic
Planet Ethos
gildedRibbon.story:
We've found an intriguing ribbon at the dig site. It's torn, but curiously, not disheveled in the slightest. Despite its silky, almost transparent appearance, dirt seems to roll right off of it! It's as though it were treated with some sort of hydrophobic spray, except for dust instead of water.
Please do send back testing results from the lab if possible; I'm intrigued to see how this effect was achieved!
